name: Work Safety Supervillain
description:
Work Safety Supervillain is about the final events of a bumbling evil genius who frantically attempts to prevent the destruction of this evil hideout.

From the moment it starts, you must frantically ensure the unstable computers you built to enslave humanity don't contribute to the countdown that that will explode your hideout. Either hit the reset buttons yourself or throw one of your tools to do it in your place. The clock is always ticking, and the self destruct sequence cannot be aborted.

Controls:

  • Left/Right Arrows - Move left / right
  • Z - Jump
  • X - Throw tool

Work Safety Supervillain is the ninth Chalk In Jam, a prototype built during the 27th week of 2016 by Chalk In Rain.

Chalk In Rain is:

  • Emre Deniz - @Emre_C_Deniz
  • Gerard Delaney - @verbvirus
